Our Story

About

We offer a range of services for the ladies/gents from Haircuts, Hair Coloring, and Treatment, Manicure - Pedicure Treatments. We also specialize in Hair Extensions and Acrylic / Gel Nail Extensions. Book with us for a refreshing time and look.

Experience the epitome of salon luxury and care with us. At K.A. Salon, your beauty aspirations are our priority, and our team is committed to exceeding your expectations every step of the way.

  • Expert Stylists
  • Customized Treatments
  • Relaxing Ambience
  • Premium Products
  • Trendsetting Services
  • Impeccable Hygiene
  • Exceptional Customer Care
  • Diverse Services
  • Community Connection

20Years Of Experince

On Point. MAKEUP

On Point est une boutique et salon de maquillage situé à Lomé, dédié à sublimer votre beauté. Nous proposons des services de maquillage professionnel, de vente de produits de beauté et d’accessoires. Vivez une expérience beauté unique avec notre équipe passionnée.
